page.title: 16RECREATION
page.content: GAMES WE PLAY Our favourite game is British bull dogs. The object is to get across the play ground with out getting cought. Someone is it. Everybody stands in a line across one end of the playground. The catcher stands in the middle of the playground and calls one of the children to come a cross, then all the rest of the children may run across without being caught. Once the person called has being caught he then helps the catcher and so on everyone becomes a catcher. The last person to be caught is in the next game and is the best British Bulldog. Another is Stuck in the mud. Someone is it and tries to catch people. When you are caught you stand like a cross with arms stretched out. Any child can come and release you by crawling under your legs any person caught 3 times is it next time.
